channel.title: ★ Ambush |
channel.description:
[CENTER]Welcome to the official Ambush advertisement thread. We are currently in beta 2.0, but that does not mean it is not playable! There is TONS of content for everyone to enjoy from Pking and PvM to Minigames and Skilling. We have huge plans for this server, hopefully you decide to tag along for the adventure. Ambush is an economy server but we really tried to make Pking a huge part of it. When Pking you can get random statue drops which you can exchange for GP, you receive Pk points which you can spend at our exclusive Pk point shops, and you can unlock different features such as ancient curses and the ability to get the red skull instead of the white(it gives a much higher chance at getting double pk points. We hope to see you online soon!
[URL=http://"http://ambushrsps.com"]For the forums click here.[/URL] [URL=http://"http://ambushrsps.com/play/"]For the webclient click here.[/URL] [URL=http://"http://ambushrsps.com/play/client.jar"]For the downloadable client click here. [/URL][/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Qogx0j5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tEZH39X.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XEv8vnL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FvVWwii.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ybbudvM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fMyX7pF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Wkbf8Ai.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Rg81IDp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VK270Qa.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vRaIDCI.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NhBRb6U.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wHNQPLp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/w5ARIcS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Rg3R7zC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/b5fo6EL.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ETgqVLG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6SM0rin.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9O6AFRk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/r9aKt1z.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Qt2Z2Oo.png[/img]

item.title: ★ Ambush |

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Interesting client background, I like it a bit. As for the rest of the thread, not sure - I suppose it’s decent, have anything that would seem unique to us?
